sectiondef.header: script.h - The clone configuration language headerfile.

memberdef.name: LuaError
memberdef.initializer: do { \ PrintFunction(); \ fprintf(stdout, args); \ fprintf(stdout, "\n"); \ lua_pushfstring(l, args); lua_error(l); \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: LuaCheckArgs

briefdescription.para: If cond then Number1 else Number2.
All possible value for a number.
All possible value for a unit.
If cond then String1 else String2.
All possible value for a string.
All possible value for a game info string.

detaileddescription.para: Enumeration to know which variable to be selected.

briefdescription.para: Structure to work with lua files.

detaileddescription.para: Load a file and execute it

parameterdescription.para: Number of arguments that caller has put on the stack
Exit the program when an error occurs

memberdef.argsstring: (lua_State *L, int narg, int nresults, int base, bool exitOnError=true)
memberdef.name: LuaCall

parameterdescription.para: Stack index of the function to call
Exit the program when an error occurs

detaileddescription.para: Convert lua string in char*. It checks also type and exit in case of error.

simplesect.para: char* could be invalidated with lua garbage collector.

detaileddescription.para: Convert lua number in C number. It checks also type and exit in case of error.
Convert lua number in C unsigned int. It checks also type and exit in case of error.
Convert lua boolean to bool. It also checks type and exits in case of error.

simplesect.para: 1 for true, 0 for false from lua.

detaileddescription.para: Get a unit pointer from ref string
Get a position from lua state
Return enum from string about variable component.

parameterdescription.para: struct with definition of the calculation.
struct with definition of the calculation.
struct with definition of the calculation.

detaileddescription.para: Free the number expression content. (not the pointer itself).

briefdescription.para: Free number description content. (no pointer itself).
